General.Name: Red Hill Iron Ltd
General.Description: Red Hill Minerals Limited engages in the exploration for and development of iron ore, and precious and base/battery metals in Western Australia. It holds 100% interests in the Pannawonica iron ore project; and the RHIOJV tenements covering an area of approximately 1,600 square kilometre in the West Pilbara. The company was formerly known as Red Hill Iron Limited and changed its name to Red Hill Minerals Limited in December 2022. Red Hill Minerals Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 9 Havelock Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
